how_many_times.message: How many times should I scroll?

extension_description.message: Extension for automatic scrolling websites with a lazy-load feature used (when you scroll up/down to get new records/items/news)

browser_action.message: To use this extension - just press your right mouse button anywhere on the page and select a scrolling option

donate.message: If you like this app - you can support author by donation (app is free and open source)

click_to_switch.message: Click me to switch to that tab.

scrolling_result.message: I scrolled $1 ($2 times) and idle now.

stuck.message: Seems like I was stuck after $1 scrolls, that's why I stopped scrolling.
